description.value:
Frequency once per day

You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a 30-foot cone, dealing [[/r 5d8 #piercing]] piercing damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes [[/r 5 #persistent bleed]] persistent bleed damage. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

[[/r ceil(@details.level.value/2)d8 #piercing]]{Levelled} piercing damage

[[/r ceil(@details.level.value/2) #persistent bleed]]{Levelled} persistent bleed damage
